channel.title: Docs on SkuyJS
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on SkuyJS

item.title: Quick Start
item.description: In this section, you will learn the basic usage of SkuyJS. To get familiar with the way to building SkuyJS application, we will build a basic CRUD operation using REST API with features that cover fundamentals. Prerequisites #prerequisites { color: #494d55; } #prerequisites:hover { text-decoration: none; } Before starting, make sure you have installed the following tools. NodeJS version 10.13.0 or above Code Editor To speed things up, a little knowledge of the following technologies will be very supportive.
